entry.value: SELECT * FROM public.state WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
UPDATE public.state SET name = :name, modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.state WHERE active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.district WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.district WHERE state IN (:state)
UPDATE public.district SET name = :name, modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1

select d.id as district_id,m.id as mandal_id,m.name as mandal_name,v.pincode as village_pincode FROM public.village v inner join panchayath p on p.id=v.panchayath inner join mandal m on p.mandal=m.id inner join district d on d.id=m.district where d.id =:id
SELECT * FROM public.district WHERE active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.mandal WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT m.name as mandal_name FROM public.mandal m WHERE district IN (:district)
UPDATE public.mandal SET name = :name, modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.mandal WHERE active = 1

SELECT m.name as mandal_name,m.id as mandal_id,d.name as district_name,d.id district_id,s.name as state_name,s.id as state_id FROM public.mandal m inner join district d on d.id=m.district inner join state s on s.id=d.state WHERE m.id= :id
SELECT * FROM public.panchayath WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
UPDATE public.panchayath SET name = :name, modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.panchayath WHERE active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.village_classification WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
UPDATE public.village_classification SET name = :name, modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.village_classification WHERE active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.village WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
UPDATE public.village SET name = :name, modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser, no_of_households = :noOfHouseholds, route = :route, pincode = :pincode WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.village WHERE active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.branch WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
UPDATE public.branch SET name = :name, mandal= :mandal, modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.branch WHERE active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.branch_villages WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
UPDATE public.branch_villages SET name = :name, modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.branch_villages WHERE active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.question_option WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
UPDATE public.question_option SET option = :option, modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.question_option WHERE active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.question_option WHERE active = 1 AND question= :question
SELECT * FROM public.survey_response WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
UPDATE public.survey_response SET modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.survey_response WHERE active = 1
UPDATE public.question SET question= :question, type= :type, created_on= :createdOn, created_user= :createdUser, modified_user= :modifiedUser, modified_on= :modifiedOn, active= :active WHERE id= :id;
SELECT * FROM public.question;
SELECT * FROM public.question WHERE id= :id;

UPDATE public.survey_question SET question= :question, survey= :survey, section_number= :sectionNumber, order_number= :orderNumber, created_on= :createdOn, created_user= :createdUser, modified_user= :modifiedUser, modified_on= :modifiedOn, active= :active WHERE id= :id;
SELECT * FROM public.survey_question;
SELECT * FROM public.survey_question WHERE id= :id;
SELECT * FROM public.role WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
UPDATE public.role SET name = :name, is_default = :isDefault, is_system = :isSystem, modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.role WHERE active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.permission WHERE id = :id AND active = 1

UPDATE public.permission SET name = :name , display_name = :displayName, type = :type, tab_name = :tabName, grouping_name = :groupingName, label_name = :labelName, level_id = :levelId, sort_order = :sortOrder, modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.permission WHERE active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.role_permission WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
UPDATE public.role_permission SET role_id = :roleID, permission_id = :permissionId, modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.role_permission WHERE active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.branch_operational_blocks WHERE id = :id AND active = 1

SELECT b.name as branch_name,b.id as branch_id, m.name as mandal_name, m.id as mandal_id,d.name as district_name,d.id district_id,s.name as state_name,s.id as state_id FROM public.branch b inner join mandal m on b.mandal=m.id inner join district d on m.district=d.id inner join state s on s.id=d.state WHERE b.id= :id;
UPDATE public.branch_operational_blocks SET branch_id = :branchId,block_id=:blockId, modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.branch_operational_blocks WHERE active = 1

SELECT b.name as branch_name,b.id as branch_id ,m.name as mandal_name,m.id as mandal_id,d.name as district_name, d.id district_id,s.name as state_name,s.id as state_id FROM public.branch_operational_blocks bo inner join branch b on bo.branch_id=b.id inner join mandal m on bo.block_id=m.id inner join district d on d.id=m.district inner join state s on s.id=d.state WHERE bo.branch_id=:id;
SELECT * FROM public.branch WHERE name ilike
SELECT * FROM public.financial_institutions WHERE id = :id AND active = 1

UPDATE public.financial_institutions SET name= :name, type= :type, contact_person = :contactPerson, mobile_number = :mobileNumber, address = :address , operating_since = :operatingSince , modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.financial_institutions WHERE active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.village_photos WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
UPDATE public.village_photos SET name = :name, village= :village, survey= :survey, s3_url= :s3Url, modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.village_photos WHERE active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.survey WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
UPDATE public.survey SET name = :name, village = :village,status = :status,modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.survey WHERE active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.operational_details WHERE id = :id
UPDATE public.operational_details SET client_detail = :clientDetail, pos= :pos, par = :par, amt_par = :amtPar WHERE id = :id
SELECT * FROM public.operational_details
SELECT * FROM public.activity WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
UPDATE public.activity SET name = :name, modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.activity
SELECT * FROM public.negative_areas WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
UPDATE public.negative_areas SET name = :name, modified_on = :modifiedOn, modified_user = :modifiedUser WHERE id = :id AND active = 1
SELECT * FROM public.negative_areas WHERE active = 1
select v.name as village_name from village v inner join panchayath p on p.id=v.panchayath inner join mandal m on m.id=p.mandal inner join branch b on b.mandal=m.id where b.id =:id

select d.name as district_name,m.name as mandal_name,v.pincode as village_pincode from village v inner join panchayath p on p.id=v.panchayath inner join mandal m on m.id=p.mandal inner join district d on d.id=m.district where v.id=:id;
